He's being a little sloppy, partly because there are different ways to try to capture the u'(0)=0 boundary condition.  If you use a forward difference (1st order accuracy), then the matrix would be [1,0,0,0;-1,1,0,0;1,-2,1,0;0,1,-2,1] etc., the vector of unknowns would be [u0; u1; u2; u3], and the RHS would be [0;0;f2;f3].
